casebody.data:
WILLIAMS
v.
HOMEQ SERVICING CORP. No. 382A07. Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 30, 2007. John F. Bloss, Greensboro, for Williams.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 30th day of August 2007 by Defendant for Extension of Time to File Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Defendant (HomEq Servicing Corp.) shall have up to and including the 5th day of October 2007 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 30th day of August 2007."
